column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Every year , my sister makes the same request for a birthday cake made the same way .
#text=Naturally , I abide , knowing that I wo n't have to buy her a present if I make her the cake .
#text=I first go to the store and pick up some ingredients I do n't already have .
#text=The very first thing I do is take out the butter to warm it up by putting it into my pocket .
#text=I then measure out all the ingredients and pull out my mixer .
#text=After mixing all the dry and wet ingredients separately , I put them together until it is well mixed .
#text=I pour the batter into the pan and put it in the oven for 40 minutes .
#text=While it is cooking , I make the frosting and decide to add some pink food coloring .
#text=When the cake is finished , I let it cool and then cover it with frosting .
#text=I put it in the fridge and will take it over to her house in a few hours .
